plot: Three families, Yang Datian, Han Qinghai, and Zhu Zhiren, were in charge of Chinese "New Year Picture" business from the end of Qing Dynasty to World War II.
title: Nian Hua
plot_es: Three families, Yang Datian, Han Qinghai, and Zhu Zhiren, were in charge of Chinese "New Year Picture" business from the end of Qing Dynasty to World War II.
plot_en: Three families, Yang Datian, Han Qinghai, and Zhu Zhiren, were in charge of Chinese "New Year Picture" business from the end of Qing Dynasty to World War II.
